description:
In this Third Volume of 12 Volumes Lightwave Instructor Adam Gibson introduces the 3D student to Lightwave's Powerful Modeler. A great series for beginner 3D students.

Table of Contents for Modeler Volume #3

Chapter 1- Intro

Chapter 2- Slice Tool

Chapter 3- Place Mesh Tool

Chapter 4- Chamfer Tool (Part One)

Chapter 5- Chamfer Tool (Part Two)

Chapter 6- Thicken Tool (Part One)

Chapter 7- Thicken Tool (Part Two)

Chapter 8- Heat Shrink Tool

Chapter 9- Final

Running Time: 1 hrs. 48 mins.

Video Format: MP4 Video (.mp4)

Level: Beginner
title: Lightwave 11.5 Modeler Volume 3
